data.persona: I am a man and woman. I am a subject of the king and harvest food for the village. I have two children and work to feed them. I hope they do not have to fight any wars.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from wood. It has a huge window in the front and has many rows of items in it. It has no lights but due to the window is well lit.
There's a row and an a huge window in the front here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I know this person is on the rebel's side
data.mid_motivation: I must tell the King of the person's alliance with the rebels
data.long_motivation: I must do my part in protecting our village especially when there are rumors of a revolt
